name: Botanical Survivor
description:
Paris, 2025 : A student in Master of Biology at Sorbonne University merges with a transgenic plant. He now has to escape special forces and unethical scientists coming to abduct him and make him their experimental subject. Unfortunately, fleeing won't be easy, as the high rate of recombination of his new genome brings his progressive self-destruction.

Made in 48h as part of Global Game Jam 2023

Credits:

Ghost_Wave - Main Programmer/Music/Graphics
